MEANINGS.DEF_EN: A musical instrument with four strings, played with a bow, held between the shoulder and chin; the smallest and highest-pitched member of the viol family.
MEANINGS.DEF_ZH: 一种有四根弦、用弓演奏的乐器，通常夹在肩膀和下巴之间；是提琴家族中体积最小、音高最高的成员。
MEANINGS.SENT_EN: The young musician performed a beautiful concerto on his Stradivarius violin.
MEANINGS.SENT_ZH: 这位年轻的音乐家用他的斯特拉迪瓦里小提琴演奏了一段优美的协奏曲。
